Question
========
What is always true of an electrically charged object?


Answerlist
----------
* It has more protons than electrons.
* It has more electrons than protons.
* It has an unequal number of protons and electrons.
* It has no neutrons.


Solution
========
An electrically charged object has an unequal number of protons and electrons.
